My Team

team =>{ team .filter(({ role }) => role === 'Manager') .map(({ name, id, email, officeNumber }) => { return `

${name}

Manager

ID: ${id}

Email: ${email}

Office Number: ${officeNumber}

`; }) .join('')} team =>{ team .filter(({ role }) => role === 'Engineer') .map(({ name, id, email, github }) => { return `

${name}

Engineer

ID: ${id}

Email: ${email}

GitHub: ${github}

`; }) .join('')} team =>{ team .filter(({ role }) => role === 'Intern') .map(({ name, id, email, school}) => { return `

${name}

Intern

ID: ${id}

Email: ${email}

School: ${school}

`; }) .join('')}
